name: Spellcasting
description: You can cast spells that grant you various positive effects, or your enemies various negative ones. You must first experience an effect naturally in order to learn the spell that grants it.

badges.text: The key to use your Spellcasting ability is bound to your "Active Power (Secondary)" key.
The key to change the spell you have selected is bound to your "Load Hotbar Activator" key. You cannot change the spell while the ability is active.
